rows: Both Powers cancel each other out.
The Wining Power passes through the other; but its Base Damage is halved.
The Wining Power passes through the other completely.
Use the action [@action Use an Active Power @].
Use the action [@action Use an Reaction Power @].
Use the action [@action Use an Swift Power @].

The power is activated as part of [@action Attack Action @], but instead of making an Offensive Roll with a weapon, the power will list what to use. This counts towards and is affected by the multiple attack penalty.
Use the action [@action Defend with a Barrier @]. Some powers with this requirement are instead activated as part of the [@action Defend with Block or Dodge Action @].

The power is activated as part of [@action Counter @] action, but instead of making an Offensive Roll with a weapon, the power will list what to use. This counts towards and is affected by the multiple attack penalty.
Use the action [@action Use a Complete Power @]. The effects of the power do not occur until the End Phase.
